item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Wins Quiet Labor Day With $12.8M, ‘Jaws’ Beats ‘Caught Stealing,’ ‘The Roses’
item.description: The holiday closes out a fraught summer for Hollywood, with domestic revenue barely able to match last year’s disappointing haul.

item.title: ‘Jaws’ Star Richard Dreyfuss Cancels SharkCon Appearance After Being Hospitalized With Viral Bronchitis
item.description: The actor recorded a video apologizing to fans and noting that he is in “a lot of pain.”
